commit message: Added tag v0.6.17-release, v0.6.17 for changeset 290140aa3e36
Throw error if the user tries to import a zip file
Fix bugs reported by Google Play Console

fix lint reported issues

Allow starting profiles by uuid in the same way as inline profiles
